DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine : - The effect arzoxifene bone mineral density ( bone mass ) spine hip postmenopausal woman . - The effect arzoxifene uterus ( womb ) postmenopausal woman . - The effect arzoxifene blood test measure change bone rebuild postmenopausal woman low bone density . - The effect arzoxifene blood lipid ( fat ) blood marker heart disease risk . - The safety arzoxifene side effect might associate use .
DOC.criteria: Female 45 60 year age , inclusive At least 2 year since last menstrual cycle Intact uterus ( womb ) . Existing fracture spine . Bone disorder , low bone mass History cancer last 5 year . Also , history , time , breast cancer cancer line uterus . Abnormal unexplained vaginal bleeding .
